title: Monsanto 's number of regular and temporary workers worldwide 2013 to 2017
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 5 groups, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Regular workers and 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Temporary workers.
Among all the Worker Types, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Temporary workers.
Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers had the biggest gap of 19500.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2015.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 5 groups, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Regular workers and 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Temporary workers.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 2 different Worker Types on X-axis for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 5 groups, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Regular workers and 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Temporary workers.
Among all the Worker Types, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Temporary workers.
Worker Type Regular workers and Temporary workers had the biggest gap of 19500.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2015.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 2 different Worker Types for 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 5 groups, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Regular workers and 2017 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Worker Type Temporary workers.
Among all the Worker Types, 2015 had the highest SOME LABEL 22500.0 in Worker Type Regular workers and lowest value 3000.0 in Worker Type Temporary workers.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2015 that was found in Worker Type Regular workers was 7.5 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Worker Type Temporary workers.
Out of all 5 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of 2015.
2015 had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 5 groups in Worker Type Regular workers followed by 2015 in Regular workers, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for 2017 in Temporary workers.
On average, the Worker Type Regular workers had the highest SOME LABEL for all 5 groups 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017. Whereas Temporary workers had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
